name: Fire Master (itch)
description:
Fire Master is a game of Game Jam made in one weekend in 2018. We were four developers.

I did a little bit of game design but my main role was graphics. 

I posted it only for the curious people of the game play he offers and the result of this game jam. This game isn’t over. You can’t lose or win. We don’t explain how to play either.

Thanks for your understanding.

Created in 2018.
